sourcesContent:
import app from './app'

app.listen(app.get('port'))
console.log('Servidor ejecutandose Pon en el navegador: http://localhost/', app.get('port'))

import { Router } from "express";
import {
  deleteTask,
  getTasks,
  saveTask,
  getTask,
  updateTask,
  getTasksCount,
} from "../controllers/tasks";

const router = Router();

/**
 * @swagger
 * components:
 *  schemas:
 *    Task:
 *      type: object
 *      properties:
 *        id:
 *          type: string
 *          description: the auto-generated id of task
 *        title:
 *          type: string
 *          description: the task title
 *        description:
 *          type: string
 *          description: the task description
 * tags:
 *  name: Tasks
 *  description: tasks endpoint
 */

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 *  get:
 *    summary: Get all Tasks
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.get("/tasks", getTasks);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/count:
 *  get:
 *    summary: get total tasks counter
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.get("/tasks/count", getTasksCount);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks:
 *  post:
 *    summary: save a new Task
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.post("/tasks", saveTask);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/{id}:
 *  get:
 *    summary: Get task by Id
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.get("/tasks/:id", getTask);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/{id}:
 *  delete:
 *    summary: delete a task by Id
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.delete("/tasks/:id", deleteTask);

/**
 * @swagger
 * /tasks/{id}:
 *  put:
 *    summary: update a task by Id
 *    tags: [Tasks]
 */
router.put("/tasks/:id", updateTask);

export default router;

import { Router } from "express";
import {
  deleteTask,
  getTasks,
  saveTask,
  getTask,
  updateTask,
  getTasksCount,
} from "../controllers/task";

const router = Router();

/**
 * @swagger
 * components:

 *          type: string
 *          description: the task title
 *        description:

 */

/**

/**

router.put("/tasks/:id", updateTask);

export default router;
